tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    attacker_ip VARCHAR(15),
    victim_ip VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE cyber_attacks (
    attack_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    attack_date DATE NOT NULL,
    attack_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    attack_vector VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    attack_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    incident_description TEXT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE cyber_attacks (
    attack_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attack_datetime TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    attack_type VARCHAR(255),
    target_system VARCHAR(255),
    success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
  incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  date_occurred DATE,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE cyber_attack_patterns (
  pattern_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  attack_type VARCHAR(50),
  attack_vector VARCHAR(50),
  severity INT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_logs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id UUID REFERENCES security_incidents(incident_id),
  log_time TIMESTAMP,
  log_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE attacker_profiles (
  attacker_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  attacker_name VARCHAR(50),
  attack_history TEXT,
  location VARCHAR(50)
)
